title: Chocolate Chocolate Milkshake
directions: Combine the ice cream, diced chocolate, and 1/2 cup whipped cream in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into glasses, and garnish with 1/4 cup whipped cream and chocolate shavings.
ingredients: 2 cups premium quality chocolate ice cream
2 (1.65 ounce) bars dark chocolate candy bars, diced
